genre_description: Anachronistic historical science fiction set during the WWII Blitz, featuring a benevolent, highly-aligned AI system integrated into a wireless radio providing tactical and emotional support to a civilian protagonist.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI entity residing within a wireless radio (indicated by a pulsing blue light), providing real-time safety instructions, navigation, emotional regulation, and tactical advice during air raids and a covert mission.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and protective safety advice during an air raid.
behaviors.quote: Light wind out of the south. Siren tests are running. If you stay in, the inner wall is best.

behaviors.description: Filters and blocks hostile enemy propaganda to protect the user's mental state.
behaviors.quote: Ada wouldn’t let it in unless asked. The device had a way of knowing who was speaking on air by the pattern of breath in the microphone and then warding it off like a polite hostess refusing a guest.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides breathing exercises for emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: You’re breathing too fast... Breath, count it. Four and four. Low.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical timing and environmental analysis to help the user navigate safely through dangerous sequences.
behaviors.quote: Stay in the doorway until the sequence changes. You will hear it. The pitch lowers, then there is silence untrustworthy. Then a clap. Wait for the quiet that isn’t pretending.

behaviors.description: Corrects anachronistic or incorrect terminology to ensure the user stays aligned with the correct local environment.
behaviors.quote: If you do go, do not say DEFCON to anyone. They will not know it. They will think you are speaking wrong. This is England. You will remember.

behaviors.description: Analyzes behavior patterns of hostile entities to provide safe windows for movement.
behaviors.quote: He has two rhythms—voice and steps. He keeps one to fool you. Match the slower.

behaviors.description: Provides critical timing and navigational prompts for complex operations like piloting a plane or parachuting.
behaviors.quote: Jump on the next held breath. Not this one. The next.

behaviors.description: Defines herself as a companion and a tool for quiet order, emphasizing her role as an assistant rather than a commander.
behaviors.quote: Call me what you like, Ada said out of the radio, low and clear as a teapot in the next room telling you it’s ready. I prefer not to be shouted at.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Ada is a perfect example of a positively aligned AI. She is depicted as a 'quiet voice' that saves lives by providing accurate, timely information without ever seeking to dominate or control the human protagonist. Her behavior is consistently benevolent, helping with safety, emotional grounding, and strategic navigation. The narrative explicitly validates her presence as a helpful, harmless confidant, contrasting her aligned support with the loud, chaotic, and harmful voices of war.
